main event: A housewife observed a red and green flashing light in the eastern sky, which later changed to a dim white light and faded out over a period of 30 minutes.
interesting points: The object was initially at an elevation of about 40 degrees, and its elevation increased by 10 degrees over the course of the sighting.
A jet aircraft was also reported to have been in the area at the time of the sighting.
The report mentions that the sighting was most likely a balloon, as the flight and description of the object conformed with this analysis.
The report includes a detailed analysis of the sighting, including a comparison to the position of the bright star Arcturus.
The report was submitted in accordance with Air Force Regulation 200-2, which outlines procedures for reporting and investigating UFO sightings.
sighted object: red and green flashing light, later becoming a dim white light
